title: I want to write a book about a period of my life, how do I go about? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends solely on you. A few years back I wrote a book called, “The way I wish it happened”. This was a book about the deaths in my life, the sadness, and pain that I experienced at a young age. I started the story with a simple intro. Everything about the story was the way I remembered it. You could choose to do something more metaphorical if you choose, but whatever you do. it’s your words telling your story. People want to see the real story. They react to the raw story.

I would suggest that you make an outline of the important parts, then fill it in with little events. Make sure it’s a period you remember well. If you cannot remember ask someone like a parent. It most likely will work out.
